data.name: Being a DIK: Season 2 - The complete official guide
data.detailed_description:
Enable an in-game guide that covers the entire second season of Being a DIK.
Press the 'g' key at any time while playing Being a DIK - Season 2 to show the guide while playing.
You can also bring up the guide by clicking the Guide button found in the quick menu.
The interface includes a quick navigation system that lets you jump to sections of the guide and jump to the page that's most relevant to the current choice in your ongoing game.

With this guide, you can get help with:
  • Finding every collectible in Season 2
  • Unlocking every lewd scene in Season 2
  • Unlocking every achievement in Season 2
  • Finding out what the characters think about your choices in Season 2
  • Finding out how your choices will affect different scenes in the game in Season 2
  • Mastering every mini-game in Season 2

The guide is packed with images and to-the-point text.

data.short_description: An in-game guide for Season 2 of Being a DIK, including a walkthrough, how to unlock everything, and more. The guide is integrated with the Being a DIK - Season 2 DLC, and you can bring it up while playing with the press of a single button.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The guide graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence.
